title: Process control
brief_description: Explains how simple statistical methods may be used in the quality control of manufactured products. Illustrates how individual product measurements may be used to compile frequency distribution curves, average and range measurements. Explains how control charts, plotted from average and range figures, may be used to control the accuracy of a manufactured product.
